In the new series, which is obviously going to end up down the same plot as this one, the setting is too similar (bombshell lonely milf, lil' hornboy, another busty female, shady and thirsty looking character waiting for something to get the plot moving, what hasn't yet appeared is the typical brown old ntr man or the typical brown "gyaru-oh" with the typical sleazy and pushy attitude, dyed hair/piercing/tattoo/etc, because japanese can only draw the fairest skinned women (often with rather foreign traits & attributes) with the swarthy-est (supposedly japanese) men or the typical jap mc with the sameface/hair as in all those isekai/harem/romcom crap, you know the ntr will happen, author has just been blue balling people for 3 episodes straight, by the way, to all the annoying negroes here with the "yeyuh boi! deys black yo! muh dik ogaa boogah bixnood dasrite!". Look up what a "gyaru-oh" is, they're not black, they are japs who dye their hair and tan themselves to be "trendy!".

How many times does this need to be uploaded? I get it, it was probably the first high quality ntr for many babies, but was ages ago, at this point, there isn't a single thing left to do with these works, they have been colorized, uncensored, translated by many in different languages (there are 3 - 5 english about this). It's obvious that the author has moved on and left it on a "...THE END?" 'till the entire thing gets remade in animation format (if you believe in deity, pray to it that/otherwise just hope that the animation of this is not handed out to those lame cheapstakes overat studio "QUEEN BEE-TCH", those bastards would forsaken it be merely moving 3 - 6 frames back and forth for 5min while the other 10 they'd spend flapping their lips un-synched, animation studios of the 90's where more skilled than them and would blow their crap out of the water.) Now days, the author is busy playing gacha games with all the cash this series netted him and occasionally working on a new series
vanillaCUCKS still SEETHING

This NTR wasnt bad because of the bait, I think that was a good move from jin to make us care for the characters. The problem is the NTR part, it was nothing new at the time and its even worse now. The amount of text this doujin had in the sex scenes is stupid, its supposed to show us that the characters are actual people instead of the usual copy paste girls we get in any other NTR, but it fails so bad that all of the characters thoughts can be replaced by "he has a big dick." the mc has no development and the ending isnt even a proper  ending. The novel version of the story has a bad ending but at least it feels like a proper conclusion. Thats why this is one of the worst NTR there are. If you guys want some good NTR just go read tsuya tsuya.
so much fun reading people crying over this xD

@keepitquite it is evil because it made you love the characters first, and then slap you hard, after that it made your woman drowning into the abyss and accept it. that time when this  first came out  I was new to Jin or MTSP works, so it made me into depression, can't read hentai for awhile. this story is different than what Arakure gave us. in Arakure you don't have relationship with the character, you can view yourself as the victim or the chad easily. In Jin work, he forced you to be the beta male. now my heart is well-trained, I can read Jin works without traumatizing myself.

Fuck id never thought id see this shit story again. Just when i thought i had forgotten it.

Oh and yeah the boy also finding the moms underwear with semen on it right after she has finally had sex for the last time and gathered all the evidence she needed, implies that the boy thinks they have all moved of from him. Which they haven't since they all still love him, but most likely with that fact + the porno he just rented there won't be a happy ending here and instead they all drift apart most likely since they boy thinks their all over him/left him/etc etc or somehow he's awoken to NTR or some shit. Sadly the author never continued this and from my understanding just left it all with the ending of boy thinking they all moved on and don't like him anymore + him renting the video of them getting raped while they were on vacation together.

With it all being her plan to film/record him raping and blackmailing her to then turn it over to the cops. Then it all ends with the mom crying that finally it's all over as she now has all the evidence she needs and will turn it into the police to arrest them all, and they can all go back to being happy together with the boy never knowing that they were all raped by a bunch of other guys. However the author then puts in a last picture of the boy now not getting much sex at all from the girls (which he is understanding about) goes to buy a porno to jerk off to. Of course he's recommended to buy the newest and most popular porno by the porno store keeper, which is the video of all the girls being raped at the hotel they were staying at before and thats were the story ends.

Quite a few of other hentai authors liked this story a lot and made quite a bit of spin offs in which almost always the girls instead falls for their rapists and often sends video to the boy of them having sex.

@Rexccer I believe all the girls get pregnant and has to get an abortion.

In short the story goes like this, boy get's taken into family of a single mother with her two daughters. All the girls loves the boy and eventually they all start having sex with the boy. Later on they all go on a trip, the girls are then drugged by the hotel staff and then filmed for porno's (the hotel staff have been doing this quite often, drugging girls and then filming them raping them to then sell the video's for money), the girls all hate it but are still super horny because of the drugs and the guys also have bigger d's then the boy. They keep getting raped/blackmailed through the night while the boy is sleeping and eventually they get back home. The girls all have to get an abortion and feels really down about all thats happened so they don't have sex anymore with the boy. One of the hotel staff comes back and tries to blackmail them into more sex. The mom steps forward and agree's.
